entry.title: Getting closer
entry.content: Getting closer to replicating my old drupal site. I have learned a lot about CSS. Still a few layout things I am slightly unhappy with, and the research section still needs to be done, but I am happy to have gotten this far.

entry.title: pjkohler site launched
entry.content: Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
